title: Core gRPC Endpoints
body_html:
gRPC Overview

Please refer to the gRPC Overview for details regarding running the examples shown below, encoding/decoding the request/response data, and clients available for several languages.

--- IMPORTANT NOTE ---

These endpoints will be unavailable on Evonet until its nodes are running an updated version of dapi-grpc necessary to support these feature.

Endpoint Details

Work in Progress

This document is an work in progress. Details may be missing or incomplete and are subject to change.

getStatus

Returns: Status information from the Core chain
Parameters: None

Example Request and Response

  • Request (gRPCurl)
grpcurl -plaintext -proto protos/core.proto \
  evonet.thephez.com:3010 \
  org.dash.platform.dapi.v0.Core/getStatus
  • Response
{
  "coreVersion": 150000,
  "protocolVersion": 70216,
  "blocks": 9380,
  "connections": 18,
  "difficulty": 0.00187190486593008,
  "relayFee": 1e-05,
  "network": "testnet"
}

getBlock

Returns: A raw block
Parameters:

Name Type Required Description
One of the following:
hash Bytes No Return the block matching the block hash provided
height Integer No Return the block matching the block height provided

Example Request and Response

  • Request (gRPCurl)
grpcurl -plaintext -proto protos/core.proto \
  -d '{
    "height":1
    }' \
  evonet.thephez.com:3010 \
  org.dash.platform.dapi.v0.Core/getBlock

Block Encoding

Note: The response block data is Base64 encoded

  • Response
{
  "block": "BAAAAC498j7sXNaobt1QlTkCjiw6PcBTFeso8rqkMhjKCAAAxLEGmzzws25Xoz5PhcO1t7RHC5/aNYro4ESZRzxR4gW6loBU//9/IAMAAAABAQAAAAEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAP////8QUQ5kZXZuZXQtcGFsaW5rYf////8BAPIFKgEAAAABagAAAAA="
}

sendTransaction

Returns: The transaction id (TXID) if successful
Parameters:

Name Type Required Description
transaction Bytes Yes A raw transaction
allow_high_fees Boolean No Enables bypassing the high fee check
bypass_limits Boolean No

Example Request and Response

  • Request (gRPCurl)
grpcurl -plaintext -proto protos/core.proto \
  -d '{
    "transaction": ""
    }' \
  evonet.thephez.com:3010 \
  org.dash.platform.dapi.v0.Core/sendTransaction
  • Response
d4b4617e1fbd70f005495c831ac6ab4b9370f3f464dd6d5604386a5154ae9f72

getTransaction

Returns: A raw transaction
Parameters:

Name Type Required Description
id String Yes A transaction id (TXID)

Example Request and Response

  • Request (gRPCurl)
grpcurl -plaintext -proto protos/core.proto \
  -d '{
    "id":"4cdc8a08e907b2fe4f33d47c0d9c8e17a2a0c60f1b8eea51fb754d02458d7cd5"
    }' \
  evonet.thephez.com:3010 \
  org.dash.platform.dapi.v0.Core/getTransaction

Transaction Encoding

Note: The response transaction data is Base64 encoded

  • Response
{
  "transaction": ""
}

Code Reference

Implementation details related to the information on this page can be found in:

  • The DAPI repository lib/grpcServer/handlers/core folder
  • The DAPI-gRPC repository protos folder
